name: Trim
descriptions: Cut bottom length or fringe only
No wash or style but can be added on

name: Scalp Treatment
descriptions: Brush away dead skin from scalp
Distribute extra natural oils to ends of hair
Massage head with scalp treatment product for ten minutes
No style, but can be added on

name: Deep Condition
descriptions: Deep conditioning product will be decided upon consultation about your hair needs
Let product sit for ten minutes, rinse, and blow dry
No style, but can be added on

name: Special Occasion Style
price: $50 plus $15 every extra hour over 3 hours
descriptions: Set up consultation before coming in
Starts at $50 for the first 3 hours

name: Highlights
descriptions: Classic highlights, balayage, hombre, etc. (Anything that would require your hair to be lighter than what it currently is)
If you have used box dye for months or years, you may need a color correction

name: Color Correction
descriptions: Time dependant on hair length and complexity of the fix required

name: Perm
descriptions: Time dependant on hair length and style of perm
$45 regular: Hair length between chin and shoulder

name: Manicure
descriptions: Add nail art for $3 per nail
Add glitter nails for $1 per nail
Includes nail prep and care, hand massage, and parafin wax dip

name: Pedicure
descriptions: Add nail art for $3 per nail
Add glitter nails for $1 per nail
Includes nail prep and care, foot scrub and callus removal, foot and leg massage, and parafin wax dip

name: Full Set Nail Enhancements
descriptions: New full set nail extensions(one color): $50
New full set nail overlay(one color): $35
Brokennail fix: $10 per natural nail or $5 per artificial nail
Add nail art for $3 per nail
Add glitter nails for $1 per nail
